headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Looking to take your criminal enterprise to the next level? Lucky you: there are an assortment of discounts on offer for just the sort of real estate and equipment that will have you kicking back in a lair of your own in no time.

- Facilities – 40% off
- Terrorbyte – 40% off
- HVY Chernobog – 40% off
- Mammoth Squaddie – 25% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
